translation: Those men who practice terrific austerities not prescribed by the scriptures, given to hypocrisy and egoism, driven by the force of lust and attachment.
commentary: 17.5 unscriptural not enjoined by the scriptures? Ghorm terrific? Tapyante practice? These who? Tapas austerity? People men? combined with pride and egoism given to hypocrisy and egoism? Kamaragabalanvitah by the force of lust and attachment.Commentary There are some who think that the mortification of the body is the proper means to attain the goal of life. They do this in order to attract the people and get money
